description.value:
Prerequisite(s): One Brutal Crocodile Maneuver
Range: Melee
Target: One creature
Duration: Instant

Description

Discipline: Brutal Crocodile (Strike) As you grab hold of the target, you lock their jaw in place so to prevent their resistance. Make a grapple check against the target. On a success, the target cannot cast spells with verbal components or make attacks with a tongue or bite attack so long as you are grappling them. In addition, the target takes [[6d6]] points of damage each round that you maintain the grapple (this stacks with any damage you may deal with constrict).
